name: FPS Remodding Weapons Prototype
description: This prototype was my attempt at making a generic system for an FPS game that allows players to adjust their favorite weapons to work with how they want to play. The player chooses a weapon type to equip, then chooses from all of the available starter weapons to grab whichever mod they want to add. Hit Confirm and the player now has a weapon they like with the mods they want. The hope for a full game would be to allow players to invest in the weapons they want to the point that the weapon can start to feel personal to them.
